data.name: Women's Prison
data.detailed_description:
Women's Prison is a first-person adventure. In this game you are put in a women's prison and you have to spend more than one year of your life here. You will need to solve puzzles and complete various tasks to undress your cellmate. Take off all her clothes!

In a first-person adventure game, you have to plunge into the world of a female prison. You want to know more about this prison. Your cellmate begins to undress for the tasks you have completed. You need to complete all her errands and make her take off all her clothes!

UNIQUE WORLD
In the new game Women's Prison, you will find yourself in a women's prison, where the beauty of inmates and their danger are inseparable.

DISCOVER A MEMORABLE HISTORY
Dive into the dark side of prisoner nature and meet charismatic characters and a unique story.


ADVANCED GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY
Women's Prison has very beautiful graphics and catchy gameplay!

data.short_description: Women's Prison is a first-person adventure. In this game you are put in a women's prison and you have to spend more than one year of your life here. You will need to solve puzzles and complete various tasks to undress your cellmate. Take off all her clothes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 6XXX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains revealing outfits and heroine nudity.
